trans-unit.source: If you’ve been reading along, then you should already have a grasp on why trying to implement conditional code with asynchronous rendering is not a good idea. If the test writer cannot accurately predict the given state of the system, then neither can Cypress. Error handling offers no additional proof this can be done deterministically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您一直在阅读，那么您应该已经掌握了为什么尝试使用异步呈现来实现条件代码并不是一个好主意。如果测试编写者无法准确预测系统的给定状态，则赛普拉斯也无法。错误处理无法提供其他确定性的证明。

trans-unit.source: If your project has a large number of tests, it can take a long time for tests to complete running serially on one machine. Running tests in parallel across many virtual machines can save your team time and money when running tests in Continuous Integration (CI).

trans-unit.source: Iframes are now correctly handled when we restore snapshots. Previously, we removed iframes which would change the page layout and the hitboxes’ coordinates we drew were wrong. Now we insert iframe placeholders that prevent the page layout from changing. Fixes #234.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当我们还原快照时，即可正确处理iframe。以前，我们删除了会更改页面布局的iframe，并且绘制的点击框的坐标是错误的。现在，我们插入阻止页面布局更改的iframe占位符。修复＃234。

trans-unit.source: Imagine you’re testing the functionality of a Shopping Cart. To test this, you need the ability to add products to that cart. Well where do the products come from? Once that’s done should you then visit each product and add each one to the shopping cart?

trans-unit.source: Improved cypress run and cypress ci headless output. Fixes #306.
trans-unit.target: 改进了 cypress run 和 cypress ci 无头输出。修复＃306。

trans-unit.source: Improved onConsole message for cy.focused() when no element was returned. Fixes #23.
trans-unit.target: 没有元素返回时，改进了 cy.focused() 的 onConsole 消息。修复＃23。

trans-unit.source: Improved accessibility of Test Runner for screen readers. Addresses #3850.
trans-unit.target: 改进了屏幕阅读器的Test Runner可访问性。地址＃3850。

trans-unit.source: Improved clicking algorithm to reduce edge cases where element could not be clicked but should have been able to be clicked.
trans-unit.target: 改进了点击算法,以减少不能点击但应该可以点击的元素的边缘情况。

trans-unit.source: Improved command errors and normalized many of them. Fixes #137.
trans-unit.target: 改进了命令错误并对其进行了标准化。修复＃137。

trans-unit.source: Improved command subject validation error messages.
trans-unit.target: 改进命令主题验证错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Improved crash reporting when the binary throws an uncaught error.
trans-unit.target: 改进了二进制文件抛出未捕获错误时的崩溃报告。

trans-unit.source: Improved displaying list of Tutorials, Recipes, Applications, and Docker examples
trans-unit.target: 改进了教程、食谱、应用和 Docker 示例的显示列表。

trans-unit.source: Improved dozens of error messages.
trans-unit.target: 改进了几十条错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Improved element display in Command Log when multiple elements are part of an assertion. Fixes #96.
trans-unit.target: 当多个元素是断言的一部分时，命令日志中的元素显示得到改善。修复＃96。

trans-unit.source: Improved error message displayed for cypress cache to not display [object Object] and made --help labels more descriptive. Fixes #2589.
trans-unit.target: 改进的错误消息显示，使 cypress cache 不显示 [object Object] ，并使 --help 标签更具描述性。修复＃2589。

trans-unit.source: Improved error message when attempting to use cy.agents or anything else which requires a remote sandbox. Fixes #12.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用 cy.agents 或其他需要远程沙箱的内容时的改进的错误消息。修复＃12。

trans-unit.source: Improved error messages for cy.readFile() and cy.writeFile().
trans-unit.target: 改进了 cy.readFile() 和 cy.writeFile() 的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Improved error messages for invalid cy.route() arguments. Fixes #20.
trans-unit.target: 改进了针对无效 cy.route() 参数的错误消息。修复＃20。

trans-unit.source: Improved error messages for traversal failures. Errors now include the parent context DOM element. Fixes #11.
trans-unit.target: 改进了遍历失败的错误消息。现在，错误包括父上下文DOM元素。修复＃11。

trans-unit.source: Improved error when cy.request() fails. The request parameters are now included in the error. Addresses #134.
trans-unit.target: cy.request() 失败时改进的错误。现在，请求参数已包含在错误中。地址＃134。

trans-unit.source: Improved errors shown when opening a project in the Desktop Application. The design is more readable and the error’s stack trace is now expandable. Addresses #2955.
trans-unit.target: 在桌面应用程序中打开项目时显示的改进的错误。该设计更具可读性，并且错误的堆栈跟踪现在可以扩展。地址＃2955。

trans-unit.source: Improved experience of search in Desktop Application when there are no results. Addresses #3146.
trans-unit.target: 没有结果时，改进的桌面应用程序搜索体验。地址＃3146。

trans-unit.source: Improved headless performance, and added optimizations for early and often GC.
trans-unit.target: 提高了无头的性能,并增加了早期和经常GC的优化。

trans-unit.source: Improved initial Desktop Application startup performance by about 1.5s.
trans-unit.target: 将初始桌面应用程序的启动性能提高了约 1.5s 。

trans-unit.source: Improved options logging and argument logging for all commands. Fixes #8.
trans-unit.target: 改进了所有命令的选项日志记录和参数日志记录。修复＃8。

trans-unit.source: Improved performance by preventing snapshots from being taken during headless runs.
trans-unit.target: 通过防止无头运行期间拍摄 snapshots 来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: Improved performance of formatting fixtures.
trans-unit.target: 提高格式化装置的性能。

trans-unit.source: Improved performance when running cypress run by caching the last bundled spec. This prevents having the same spec file rebundled each time cy.visit() caused a full page navigation. You should see a moderate improvement in test run time. Fixes #370.
trans-unit.target: 通过缓存最后捆绑的规范，提高了运行 cypress run 性能。这样可以防止每次 cy.visit() 引起整页导航时都重新打包相同的spec文件。您应该看到测试运行时间有了适度的改进。修复＃370。

trans-unit.source: Improved reliability for displaying the remote url.
trans-unit.target: 提高了显示远程网址的可靠性。

trans-unit.source: Improved the error message displayed to users on Windows attempting to download the Cypress Desktop app.
trans-unit.target: 改进了尝试下载Cypress Desktop应用程序的Windows用户显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Improved the calculations to calculate an elements visibility. Additionally updated error messages to be clearer whenever an element isn’t considered visible. Fixes #613
trans-unit.target: 改进了计算以计算元素可见性的计算。此外，更新的错误消息可以在不认为元素可见时更清晰地显示。修复＃613

trans-unit.source: Improved the element detachment error messages (when you try to interact with an element that’s become stale / detached from the document).
trans-unit.target: 改进了元素分离错误消息（当您尝试与已失效/与文档分离的元素进行交互时）。

trans-unit.source: Improved the reporter’s responsive design so controls still show at narrower widths. Fixes #544.
trans-unit.target: 改进了记者的响应式设计，因此控件仍显示为较窄的宽度。修复＃544。

trans-unit.source: Improved verifying the binary for the first time after an npm install. Fixes #709.
trans-unit.target: 改进了在 npm install 后首次验证二进制文件的功能。修复＃709。

trans-unit.source: In CI, the window size (not the viewport) has been changed from 1024x768 to 1280x720. This will only affect screenshot artifacts which are taken automatically with cy.screenshot() (coming soon) or whenever a test fails (also coming soon).
trans-unit.target: 在CI中，窗口大小（而非视口）已从 1024x768 更改为 1280x720 。这只会影响通过 cy.screenshot() （即将推出）或测试失败（也即将推出）自动获取的 screenshot 工件。

trans-unit.source: In Cypress there is no built in error recovery from a failed command. A command and its assertions all eventually pass, or if one fails, all remaining commands are not run, and the test fails.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯中，无法从失败的命令中恢复内置错误。一个命令及其断言最终都会全部通过，或者如果一个命令失败，则所有其余命令都不会运行，并且测试也会失败。

trans-unit.source: In Cypress, “environment variables” are variables that are accessible via Cypress.env. These are not the same as OS-level environment variables. However, it is possible to set Cypress environment variables from OS-level environment variables.
In Cypress, querying elements is the same:
trans-unit.target: 在Cypress中,查询元素是一样的。

trans-unit.source: In Cypress, when you want to interact with a DOM element directly, call .then() with a callback function that receives the element as its first argument. When you want to skip the retry-and-timeout functionality entirely and perform traditional synchronous work, use Cypress.$.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯中，当您想直接与DOM元素进行交互时，请使用将元素作为第一个参数的回调函数调用 .then() 。如果要完全跳过重试和超时功能并执行传统的同步工作，请使用 Cypress.$ 。

trans-unit.source: In Cypress, you almost never need to use cy.wait() for an arbitrary amount of time. If you are finding yourself doing this, there is likely a much better, simpler way.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯中，几乎不需要在任何时间量内使用 cy.wait() 。如果您发现自己正在这样做，则可能有更好，更简单的方法。

trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下，从自定义位置安装二进制文件的事实都不会保存在 package.json 文件中。每次重复安装都需要使用相同的环境变量来安装相同的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: In case you missed it before - Cypress tests run inside of the browser! This means we can do things nobody else can. There is no object serialization or JSON wire protocols. You have real, native access to everything in your application under test. It is impossible for Cypress to ‘miss’ elements and it always knows the moment your application fires any kind of event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您之前错过了它-赛普拉斯测试将在浏览器中运行！这意味着我们可以做其他人无法做的事情。没有对象序列化或JSON有线协议。您可以对要测试的应用程序中的所有内容进行真正的本机访问。赛普拉斯不可能“遗失”元素，并且总是知道您的应用程序触发任何类型的事件的那一刻。

trans-unit.source: In each of these examples, it’s important to note that Cypress will automatically wait until these assertions pass. This prevents you from having to know or care about the precise moment your elements eventually do reach this state.
trans-unit.target: 在上述每个示例中，必须注意，赛普拉斯将自动等待这些声明通过。这使您不必知道或关心元素最终最终达到此状态的确切时间。

trans-unit.source: In each of these situations, Cypress will lose the ability to automate your application and will immediately error.
trans-unit.target: 在上述每一种情况下,赛普拉斯都将失去自动化您的应用程序的能力,并将立即出错。

trans-unit.source: In fact we can likely bypass the initial visit altogether and just POST directly to your SSO server.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，我们可能会完全绕开初始访问，而直接将 POST 直接发送到您的 SSO 服务器。

trans-unit.target: 实际上，只有在使用上述算法运行可操作命令时，我们才将元素滚动到视图中。我们不会将元素滚动到常规DOM命令（例如 cy.get() 或 .find() ）的视图中。

trans-unit.target: 我们以绿色突出显示了该文件中存在的4条语句。前三个语句每个都执行一次，而最后一个语句则永远不会执行（它可能在 if 语句内部）。通过使用该应用程序，我们既可以递增计数器，又可以将某些零计数器翻转为正数。

trans-unit.source: In many single-page JavaScript applications the DOM re-renders parts of the application constantly. If you alias DOM elements that have been removed from the DOM by the time you call cy.get() with the alias, Cypress automatically re-queries the DOM to find these elements again.
trans-unit.target: 在许多单页JavaScript应用程序中，DOM不断重新渲染应用程序的某些部分。如果使用别名给 cy.get() 命名时已将别名从DOM中删除的DOM元素作为别名，则Cypress会自动重新查询DOM以再次找到这些元素。

trans-unit.source: In modern JavaScript frameworks, DOM elements are regularly re-rendered - meaning that the old element is thrown away and a new one is put in its place. Because this happens so fast, it may appear as if nothing has visibly changed to the user. But if you are in the middle of executing test commands, it’s possible the element you’re interacting with has become “dead”. To deal with this situation you must:

trans-unit.source: In this example let’s assume you visit your website and the content will be different based on which A/B campaign your server decides to send. Perhaps it is based on geo-location, IP address, time of day, locale, or other factors that are difficult to control. How can you write tests in this manner?
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，假设您访问了您的网站，并且服务器决定发送哪个A / B广告系列，其内容也会有所不同。可能是基于地理位置，IP地址，一天中的时间，区域设置或其他难以控制的因素。您如何以这种方式编写测试？

trans-unit.source: In this example we have a little text input field and we invoke an async action which will disable this input field.
In this example we use .and() which is identical to .should().
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中我们使用 .and() ，其是相同的 .should() 。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a single machine runs a job named 1x-electron, defined in the project’s circle.yml file. Cypress runs all 19 spec files one by one alphabetically in this job. It takes 1:51 to complete all of the tests.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，一台机器运行一个名为 1x-electron 的作业，该作业在项目的circle.yml文件中定义。赛普拉斯会按字母顺序逐个运行所有19个规格文件。完成所有测试需要1:51。

trans-unit.source: In this example, imagine there is a clock in your app showing the current time. This can cause screenshots to be non-deterministic, which could create false negatives when screenshot diffing. You can use onBeforeScreenshot to hide the clock and then show it again with onAfterScreenshot.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，假设您的应用程序中有一个时钟显示当前时间。这可能会导致屏幕截图不确定，从而可能会在屏幕截图差异时产生假阴性。您可以使用 onBeforeScreenshot 隐藏时钟，然后用再次显示 onAfterScreenshot 。

trans-unit.source: In this example, let’s imagine you are running a bunch of tests and each time you load your application, it may show a “Welcome Wizard” modal.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，假设您正在运行大量测试，并且每次加载应用程序时，它都可能显示“ Welcome Wizard”模式。

trans-unit.source: In this example, on first login our server sends us back a session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中,第一次登录时,我们的服务器会给我们发回一个会话cookie。

trans-unit.source: In this example, on first login our server sends us back a session cookie. After invoking cy.clearCookies() this clears the session cookie, and upon navigating to an unauthorized page, our server should have redirected us back to login.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们的服务器在首次登录时向我们发送回一个会话cookie。调用 cy.clearCookies() 之后,这将清除会话cookie，并导航到未经授权的页面后，我们的服务器应已将我们重定向回登录。

trans-unit.source: In this example, on first login, our server sends us back a session cookie.
trans-unit.target: 在这个例子中,在第一次登录时,我们的服务器会给我们发回一个会话cookie。

trans-unit.source: In this example, on first login, our server sends us back a session cookie. After invoking cy.clearCookie('session_id'), this clears the session cookie. Then upon navigating to an unauthorized page, we asset that our server has redirected us back to login.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，首次登录时，我们的服务器将会话cookie发送回给我们。调用 cy.clearCookie('session_id') 之后，这将清除会话cookie。然后，导航到未经授权的页面后，我们认为服务器已将我们重定向回登录。

trans-unit.source: In this example, our matching requests will be delayed 1000ms and have a status of 422, but its response will be what was set in cy.route().
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们的匹配请求将延迟1000ms，状态为 422 ，但其 response 将是在 cy.route() 中设置的响应。

trans-unit.source: In this example, there are many possible sources of failure. In most testing tools, if our request failed to go out, we would normally only ever get an error once we attempt to find the results in the DOM and see that there is no matching element. This is problematic because it’s unknown why the results failed to be displayed. Was there a problem with our rendering code? Did we modify or change an attribute such as an id or class on an element? Perhaps our server sent us different Book items.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，有许多可能的故障源。在大多数测试工具中，如果我们的请求失败，通常只有在我们尝试在DOM中找到结果并且看到没有匹配的元素时，才会出错。这是有问题的，因为不知道为什么无法显示结果。我们的渲染代码有问题吗？我们是否修改或更改了元素上的属性，例如 id 或 class ？也许我们的服务器向我们发送了不同的Book项目。

trans-unit.source: In this guide we will lay out what some of the trade-offs are - and specifically how you can work around them.
trans-unit.target: 在本指南中,我们将列出一些权衡--特别是如何解决这些问题。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, not only did we wait a long period of time, but when the <#wizard> element was eventually shown it’s likely caused an error downstream on other commands.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，我们不仅要等待很长一段时间，而且最终显示 <#wizard> 元素时，很可能在其他命令的下游导致错误。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, you want to close the wizard when it is present and ignore it if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,你要在向导存在时关闭它,如果它不存在,则忽略它。

trans-unit.source: In version 0.20.0, we removed the commands for adding custom commands and replaced them with, what we believe to be, a simpler interface.
trans-unit.target: 在版本 0.20.0 中，我们删除了用于添加自定义命令的命令，并以我们认为更简单的界面替换了它们。

trans-unit.source: In versions before 0.20.0 of Cypress we automatically detected this and forced the cy commands to be returned. To make things less magical and clearer, we are now throwing an error.
trans-unit.target: 在赛普拉斯 0.20.0 之前的版本中，我们会自动检测到此情况，并强制返回 cy 命令。为了使事情变得不那么神奇和清晰，我们现在抛出一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Instead of hard coding external documentation, we now link everything through a redirection portal. This will prevent any links / documentation from ever breaking due to reorganization or renaming.

trans-unit.source: Instead of hard coding it into your run command like this:

trans-unit.source: Instead of hardcoding the URL you can use the baseUrl of the Cypress configuration.

Instead of having your test code bypass OAuth, you could also ask your server for help. Perhaps all an OAuth token does is generate a user in your database. Oftentimes OAuth is only useful initially and your server establishes its own session with the client. If that is the case, just use cy.request() to get the session directly from your server and bypass the provider altogether.
trans-unit.target: 除了让测试代码绕过OAuth之外，您还可以向服务器寻求帮助。一个OAuth令牌可能所做的只是在您的数据库中生成一个用户。通常，OAuth仅在最初有用，并且您的服务器与客户端建立自己的会话。如果是这种情况，只需使用 cy.request() 即可直接从服务器获取会话并完全绕过提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Instead of just executing a system command, you may want more flexibility and could expose a series of routes only when running in a test environment.
trans-unit.target: 而不是只执行一个系统命令,你可能想要更多的灵活性,可以只在测试环境中运行时暴露一系列路由。

trans-unit.source: Instead of seeing Script error. - cross origins script errors are now handled specially and we throw a very long and exciting error explaining what just happened. Fixes #241.
trans-unit.target: 而不是看到 Script error. -现在，跨源脚本错误已得到特别处理，我们抛出了一个很长且令人兴奋的错误，解释了刚刚发生的事情。修复＃241。

trans-unit.source: Instead of setting environment variables in a file, you can use plugins to dynamically set them with Node code. This enables you to do things like use fs and read off configuration values and dynamically change them.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用插件通过Node代码动态设置它们，而不必在文件中设置环境变量。这使您能够执行诸如使用 fs 之类的事情，并读取配置值并动态更改它们。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the npx instrument command, we can use babel-plugin-istanbul to instrument the code as part of its transpilation. Add this plugin to the .babelrc file.
trans-unit.target: 代替使用 npx instrument 命令，我们可以使用 babel-plugin-istanbul 来对代码进行代码化，作为其编译的一部分。将此插件添加到 .babelrc 文件。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the this.* syntax, there is another way to access aliases.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用 this.* 语法，还有另一种访问别名的方法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of waiting until commands resolve, commands are immediately inserted with a pending status.
trans-unit.target: 无需等待命令解析，而是立即以 pending 状态插入命令。

trans-unit.source: Instead of writing a response inline you can automatically connect a response with a cy.fixture().
trans-unit.target: 不用编写内联响应，您可以自动将响应与 cy.fixture() 连接起来。

trans-unit.source: Instead, adding the data-cy attribute to the element gives us a targeted selector that’s only used for testing.
trans-unit.target: 取而代之的是，将 data-cy 属性添加到元素为我们提供了一个仅用于测试的目标选择器。

trans-unit.source: Instead, all you need to test is that the href property is correct!
trans-unit.target: 相反，您需要测试的是 href 属性是正确的！

trans-unit.source: Instead, use cy.then() callback to check the value.
trans-unit.target: 而是使用 cy.then() 回调检查该值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should build a docker container for your project’s version of cypress.
trans-unit.target: 相反，您应该为您的项目的cypress版本构建一个docker容器。

trans-unit.source: Internal routing errors in Cypress are now gracefully handled with x-cypress-error and x-cypress-stack set on response headers.
trans-unit.target: 现在，可以通过在响应头上设置 x-cypress-error 和 x-cypress-stack 来优雅地处理Cypress中的内部路由错误。

trans-unit.source: Internally Cypress does account for this, and will polyfill the blur events when necessary to replicate what the browser does. Unfortunately the browser will still behave differently when not in focus - for instance it may throttle async events. Your best bet here is to keep Cypress focused when working on a test.
trans-unit.target: 在内部,Cypress确实考虑到了这一点,并将在必要时对模糊事件进行多级填充,以复制浏览器的做法。不幸的是,当浏览器不聚焦时,它仍然会有不同的行为--例如,它可能会对异步事件进行节流。你最好的选择是在测试时保持Cypress聚焦。

trans-unit.source: Internally our built in commands make use of every single one of these combinations above.
trans-unit.target: 在我们的内部,我们的内置命令利用了上述的每一个组合。

trans-unit.source: Internally refactored Cypress for easier testability / debuggability.
trans-unit.target: 内部重构了Cypress,使其更容易测试/调试。

trans-unit.source: Internally refactored how browsers are added and spawned in preparation of us adding cross browser support.
trans-unit.target: 内部重构了浏览器的添加和生成方式,为我们添加跨浏览器支持做准备。

trans-unit.source: Internally, Cypress has made a reference to the <tr> collection returned as the alias “rows”. To reference these same “rows” later, you can use the cy.get() command.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，赛普拉斯已经引用了作为别名“行”返回的 <tr> 集合。要在以后引用这些相同的“行”，可以使用 cy.get() 命令。

trans-unit.source: Introduced new cy.fixture() command.
trans-unit.target: 引入了新的 cy.fixture() 命令。

trans-unit.source: Introduced new command optionlength which cues Cypress into not resolving matched elements until their length matches the option provided.
trans-unit.target: 引入了新的命令选项 length ，这导致赛普拉斯无法解析匹配的元素，直到它们的长度与提供的选项匹配为止。

trans-unit.source: It is common for tests in Cypress to issue 30+ commands. Because nearly every command has a default assertion (and can therefore fail), even by limiting your assertions you’re not saving yourself anything because any single command could implicitly fail.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯中的测试通常会发布30多个命令。因为几乎每个命令都有一个默认断言（因此可能会失败），即使限制了断言，您也不会保存任何东西，因为任何单个命令都可能隐式失败。

trans-unit.source: It is crucial that you understand how your application works else you will write flaky tests.
trans-unit.target: 了解你的应用程序是如何工作的是至关重要的,否则你会写出片面的测试。

trans-unit.source: It is incredibly time consuming and slows down your tests.
trans-unit.target: 它非常耗时,而且会拖慢你的测试速度。

trans-unit.source: It is very important to understand that Cypress commands don’t do anything at the moment they are invoked, but rather enqueue themselves to be run later. This is what we mean when we say Cypress commands are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 理解Cypress命令在被调用时不执行任何操作，而是让它们自己排队以便稍后运行，这一点非常重要。这就是说赛普拉斯命令是异步的。

trans-unit.source: It should look something like http://localhost:8080.
trans-unit.target: 它应该看起来像http：// localhost：8080。

trans-unit.source: It simplifies running Cypress in Continuous Integration.
trans-unit.target: 它简化了赛普拉斯在持续集成中的运行。

trans-unit.target: 将注册和登录流程置于测试范围内是一个好主意，因为它对所有用户都非常重要，并且您永远都希望它不会中断。

trans-unit.source: It’s still useful to load a setup file before your test code. If you are setting Cypress defaults or utilizing custom Cypress commands, instead of needing to import/require those defaults/commands in every test file, you can use the supportFile configuration option.
trans-unit.target: 在测试代​​码之前加载设置文件仍然很有用。如果要设置赛普拉斯默认值或使用自定义赛普拉斯命令，则无需在每个测试文件中导入/要求这些默认值/命令，可以使用 supportFile 配置选项。

trans-unit.source: It’s very important to understand the mechanism Cypress uses to chain commands together. It manages a Promise chain on your behalf, with each command yielding a ‘subject’ to the next command, until the chain ends or an error is encountered. The developer should not need to use Promises directly, but understanding how they work is helpful!
trans-unit.target: 了解赛普拉斯将命令链接在一起的机制非常重要。它代表您管理一个Promise链，每个命令对下一个命令产生一个“主题”，直到链结束或遇到错误为止。开发人员不必直接使用Promises，但了解它们的工作方式将很有帮助！

trans-unit.source: Just be sure not to include any code that has side effects in your callback function. The callback function will be retried over and over again until no assertions within it throw.

trans-unit.source: Most likely fixed a bug that was crashing Cypress due to Cannot set headers after they've been sent. We were unable to write a test for this since we could not recreate the error, but analyzed how it may happen and fixed the code there. Open an issue if you see this error, it will be obvious since Cypress will literally crash.
trans-unit.target: 最有可能修复了由于发送 Cannot set headers after they've been sent 而导致Cypress崩溃的错误。我们无法写一个测试这个，因为我们无法重建错误，但分析如何可能发生，固定的代码存在。如果看到此错误，请打开一个问题，这很明显，因为赛普拉斯实际上会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: Most of the action commands now take multiple snapshots (giving you a precise look at an action prior to it happening, and then afterwards).
trans-unit.target: 大多数的操作命令现在都会有多个快照(让你在操作发生之前和之后都能精确地看到它)。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time this use case is needed when users click an <a> that opens a new tab. Users then want to switch to that tab to verify that the content loaded. But, you shouldn’t need to do this. In fact we have recipes of showing you how to test this without multiple tabs.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，当用户单击 <a> 打开一个新选项卡时，将需要此用例。然后，用户希望切换到该选项卡以验证内容是否已加载。但是，您不需要这样做。实际上，我们有一些食谱向您展示如何在没有多个选项卡的情况下进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, when querying for elements, you expect them to eventually exist. But sometimes you wish to wait until they don’t exist.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，查询元素时，您希望它们最终存在。但是有时您希望等到它们不存在。

trans-unit.source: Most testing tools (like Selenium) operate by running outside of the browser and executing remote commands across the network. Cypress is the exact opposite. Cypress is executed in the same run loop as your application.
trans-unit.target: 大多数测试工具（例如Selenium）都是通过在浏览器外部运行并通过网络执行远程命令来运行的。赛普拉斯正好相反。赛普拉斯与您的应用程序在同一运行循环中执行。

trans-unit.source: Non-breaking space

None of the above commands are idempotent; they all cause side effects. Racing commands is not possible because commands must be run in a controlled, serial manner in order to create consistency. Because integration and e2e tests primarily mimic the actions of a real user, Cypress models its command execution model after a real user working step by step.
trans-unit.target: 以上命令都不是幂等的；它们都会引起副作用。竞速命令是不可能的，因为命令必须以受控的串行方式运行才能创建一致性。由于集成和端到端测试主要模拟真实用户的行为，因此赛普拉斯在真实用户逐步工作之后对其命令执行模型进行建模。

trans-unit.source: Note: we recommend deleting all files from the cypress/results folder before running this command, since each run will output new XML files. For example, we can add the npm script commands below to our package.json:
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们建议您在运行此命令之前从 cypress/results 文件夹中删除所有文件，因为每次运行都会输出新的XML文件。例如，我们可以将以下npm脚本命令添加到 package.json 中：

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: Notes

trans-unit.source: Nothing slows a test suite down like having to log in, but all the good parts of your application most likely require an authenticated user! Here are some tips.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比登录更会拖慢测试套件的速度了,但是你的应用程序的所有好的部分很可能都需要一个经过认证的用户!这里有一些技巧。这里有一些提示。

trans-unit.source: Notice Cypress displays a message about this being the default page on the righthand side. Cypress assumes you’ll want to go out and visit a URL on the internet - but it can also work just fine without that.
trans-unit.target: 注意，赛普拉斯在右侧显示一条有关此为默认页面的消息。赛普拉斯假设您想出去访问 Internet上的URL，但是没有它，它也可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Notice Cypress displays the message that it couldn’t find any tests. This is normal - we haven’t written any tests! Sometimes you’ll also see this message if there was an error parsing your test file. You can always open your Dev Tools to inspect the Console for any syntax or parsing errors that prevented Cypress from reading your tests.
trans-unit.target: 注意，赛普拉斯会显示一条消息，它找不到任何测试。这是正常现象-我们还没有编写任何测试！如果解析您的测试文件时出错，有时您还会看到此消息。您始终可以打开开发工具来检查控制台中是否有任何语法或解析错误，从而阻止了Cypress读取您的测试。

trans-unit.source: Notice how the ADD_TODO action was executed 3 times - because our test has added 3 todo items, and the COMPLETE_TODO action was executed just once - because our test has marked 1 todo item as completed.
trans-unit.target: 注意，ADD_TODO操作是如何执行3次的-因为我们的测试添加了3个待办事项，而COMPLETE_TODO操作仅执行了一次-因为我们的测试将1个待办事项标记为已完成。

trans-unit.source: Notice it highlights in purple. This did three things worth noting…
trans-unit.target: 请注意，它以紫色突出显示。这做了三件事，值得注意的是……

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Cypress npm package is a wrapper around the Cypress binary. The version of the npm package determines the version of the binary downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，赛普拉斯 npm 软件包是赛普拉斯二进制文件的包装。该版本 npm 包决定二进制下载的版本。

trans-unit.source: Notice that this timeout has flowed down to all assertions and Cypress will now wait up to 10 seconds total for all of them to pass.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此超时已经涉及所有断言，而赛普拉斯现在将总共等待10秒以使所有这些断言通过。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when adding up the spec’s run times (0:55), they add up to less than the total time for the run to complete (1:51) . There is extra time in the run for each spec: starting the browser, encoding and uploading the video to the dashboard, requesting the next spec to run.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将规格的运行时间加起来（0:55）时，它们的总和少于完成运行所需的总时间（1:51）。每个规范的运行时间都更长：启动浏览器，编码并将视频上传到仪表板，请求下一个规范运行。

trans-unit.source: Notice the calls to cov_18hmhptych.s[0]++ and cov_18hmhptych.s[1]++ that increment the statement counters. All counters and additional book-keeping information is stored in a single object attached to the browser’s window object. We can see the counters if we serve the instrumented folder instead of src and open the application.
trans-unit.target: 注意对 cov_18hmhptych.s[0]++ 和 cov_18hmhptych.s[1]++ 的调用会增加语句计数器的数量。所有计数器和其他簿记信息都存储在附加到浏览器 window 对象的单个对象中。如果我们提供已 instrumented 文件夹而不是 src 并打开应用程序，则可以看到计数器。

trans-unit.source: Notice there is also a funny looking Log called: (PAGE LOAD) followed by another entry for (NEW URL). Neither of these was a command that we issued - rather Cypress itself will log out important events from your application when they occur. Notice these look different (they are gray and without a number).

trans-unit.source: Often a Cypress command has built-in assertions that will cause the command to be retried. For example, the .eq() command will be retried even without any attached assertions until it finds an element with the given index in the previously yielded list of elements.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯命令通常具有内置的断言，这些断言将导致重试该命令。例如，即使没有附加任何断言，也将重试 .eq() 命令，直到在先前产生的元素列表中找到具有给定索引的元素为止。

trans-unit.source: Oftentimes we see users wanting the ability to use multiple reporters. When running in CI, you might want to generate a report for junit and perhaps a json report. This is great, but by setting this reporter you won’t receive any additional feedback while the tests are running!

trans-unit.source: Oftentimes your application may make initial requests immediately when it loads (such as authenticating a user). Cypress makes it possible to start your server and define routes before a cy.visit(). Upon the next visit, the server + routes will be instantly applied before your application loads.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您的应用程序在加载时可能会立即发出初始请求（例如，对用户进行身份验证）。赛普拉斯可以在 cy.visit() 之前启动服务器并定义路由。下次访问时，服务器+路由将在应用程序加载之前立即应用。

trans-unit.source: Oftentimes, once you have a proper e2e test around logging in, there’s no reason to continue to cy.visit() the login and wait for the entire page to load all associated resources before running any other commands. Doing so can slow down our entire test suite.

trans-unit.source: One Superdomain per Test

trans-unit.source: One advantage of declaratively waiting for responses is that it decreases test flake. You can think of cy.wait() as a guard that indicates to Cypress when you expect a request to be made that matches a specific routing alias. This prevents the next commands from running until responses come back and it guards against situations where your requests are initially delayed.
trans-unit.target: 声明式等待响应的一个优点是，它可以减少测试碎片。您可以将 cy.wait() 视为一种保护，当您期望发出与特定路由别名匹配的请求时，该保护会向Cypress指示。这样可以防止下一个命令在响应返回之前一直运行，并且可以防止您的请求最初被延迟。

trans-unit.source: One check per run group.
trans-unit.target: 每个运行组一次检查。

trans-unit.source: One common scenario Cypress supports is visiting a remote page and also preventing any Ajax requests from immediately going out.
trans-unit.target: Cypress支持的一个常见场景是访问远程页面,同时也防止任何Ajax请求立即出去。

trans-unit.source: One final question you should ask yourself is - is resetting the state even necessary? Remember, Cypress already automatically clears localStorage, cookies, sessions, etc before each test. Make sure you are not trying to clean up state that is already cleaned up by Cypress automatically.
trans-unit.target: 您应该问自己的最后一个问题是-是否需要重置状态？请记住，赛普拉斯已经在每次测试之前自动清除了 localStorage ，cookie，会话等。确保您不尝试清除赛普拉斯已自动清除的状态。

trans-unit.source: One group can be called package/admin:
trans-unit.target: 一组可以称为 package/admin ：

trans-unit.source: One last thing to consider here is that every once in a while we discover bugs in Cypress that lead to cross origin errors that can otherwise be fixed. If you think you’re experiencing a bug, come into our chat or open an issue.
trans-unit.target: 这里要考虑的最后一件事是，我们偶尔会在赛普拉斯中发现导致 cross origin 错误的错误，而这些错误原本可以得到解决。如果您认为自己遇到错误，请加入我们的聊天室或提出一个问题。

trans-unit.source: One of the best parts of Cypress is its emphasis on debuggability. Unlike other testing tools - when your tests end - you are left with your working application at the exact point where your test finished.
trans-unit.target: 其中的最佳赛普拉斯的部分是强调可调试。与其他测试工具不同（测试结束时），您可以在完成测试的确切时间使用正在运行的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: One of the first (and arguably one of the hardest) hurdles you’ll have to overcome is testing logging into your application.
trans-unit.target: 您必须克服的第一个（可能是最困难的）障碍之一是测试登录到应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: One of the first things many of our users attempt to do is involve 3rd party servers in their tests.
trans-unit.target: 我们许多用户试图做的第一件事就是让第三方服务器参与他们的测试。

trans-unit.source: One thing you may notice though is that Cypress still enforces visiting a single superdomain with cy.visit(), but there is an issue open to change this restriction.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会注意到的一件事是，赛普拉斯仍然使用 cy.visit() 强制访问单个超域，但是要更改此限制存在一个开放的问题。

trans-unit.source: Overhauled the entire subsystem dealing with an element’s visibility state. Previously we were using jQuery’s .is(":visible") selector which was ineffective at truly determining when an element is “visible”. Our changes now differ significantly from jQuery, but they match what a real user would consider visible, and the rules are fairly easy to explain. In other words these rules should just “make sense”.
trans-unit.target: 检修了处理元素可见性状态的整个子系统。以前，我们使用的是jQuery的 .is(":visible") 选择器，该选择器无法真正确定元素何时“可见”。现在，我们的更改与jQuery显着不同，但是它们与实际用户认为可见的内容匹配，并且规则很容易解释。换句话说，这些规则应该“有意义”。
